attributes.action: The Government needs to provide a department to help people emigrate to the EU.
attributes.additional_details: More provision should be made for simple and effective liaison with foreign/EU bodies that deal with immigration - in order to reduce the amount of disruption for everyone, but especially those incapable or simply unaware of the legal processes involved.
attributes.background: This Government has failed to heed half its population, many of whom would like to leave the UK because of it. Changing nationality is NOT a simple or cheap process. Some help should be given to those who feel their government has betrayed them.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

The UK Government already provides advice for people about living overseas, primarily through the Foreign and Commonwealth Office.

You can find more here:

https://www.gov.uk/browse/abroad/living-abroad
